description: Try our easy to follow Beer-Brined Chicken With Barbecue Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: BeerBrined Chicken With Barbecue Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Set aside half the barbecue sauce for serving. Continue cooking chicken, uncovered, basting occasionally with half the sauce for 10 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. Stand, covered, for 10 minutes before serving with reserved sauce and lime wedges.
